an10.237:1.1: “For insight into greed, ten things should be developed.
an10.237:1.3: The perceptions of ugliness, death, repulsiveness of food, dissatisfaction with the whole world, impermanence, suffering in impermanence, and not-self in suffering, giving up, fading away, and cessation.
an10.237:1.4: For insight into greed, these ten things should be developed.”
